The Height Of Folly

Chapter Info

Volume:

109

Chapter:

1105

Japanese Title:

愚の骨頂

Romanized Title:

Gu no Kotchō

Viz Title:

The Height Of Folly

Pages:

13

January 29, 2024

WSJ Issue:

2024 Issue 9

Anime:

Episode 1139 (p. 2-13)
Chapter Chronology
← Previous Next →
Chapter 1105 is titled "The Height Of Folly".

Contents

  • 1 Cover Page
  • 2 Short Summary
  • 3 Long Summary
  • 4 Quick References
    • 4.1 Chapter Notes
    • 4.2 Characters
  • 5 Author Comment
  • 6 Arc Navigation

Cover Page[]

Cover Page Request: "Carrot cooking a stew (and preferably taste-testing it!)" by PN Odamania's Brother.

Short Summary[]

As the Marines prepare the Buster Call, Vegapunk attempts to give himself to no avail as Saturn does not believe the world needs progress. Sanji sends the rest of the group to Labophase while he will retrieve Vegapunk as he contacts Nami to warn the others about the Buster Call. Nami reports the situation from their end, including that Lilith and Brook have moved the Thousand Sunny. As the Marines begin their bombardment, Kizaru destroys the Vacuum Rocket that Franky's group is on.

As Saturn orders the Pacifistas to kill Kuma and Bonney, Luffy is discovered to be using the Food Machine to replenish himself. Meanwhile the Marine ship sent to kill the researchers that escaped Egghead is damaged and the surviving Marines onboard want to warn Kizaru that they failed in their mission and that an unknown party is heading to Egghead.

Long Summary[]

All Marines are ordered to return to the ships before the Buster Call can begin. Doll tells Saturn and Kizaru to return to the ships with them, but Saturn says the two of them will remain on the island and to begin the bombardment as soon as possible. Doll is hesitant, but Kizaru sternly orders her to leave, and she does. Dr. Vegapunk demands to know why Saturn wants all of Egghead Island destroyed if he just came for his life, claiming that if the island is destroyed, it will set mankind back by an entire century. He pleads with the two of them to call off the attack, but Saturn refuses, claiming Dr. Vegapunk might be hiding more things from the World Government on the island, but he also says that mankind has no need for further advancement.

Saturn then tells Dr. Vegapunk that he ordered the ship with all of the researchers hunted down and destroyed, to the scientist’s shock. Saturn tries to justify his decision by saying the researchers may have known something about the Void Century, so he wanted them all dead to ensure they do not tell anyone. Dr. Vegapunk yells that none of them knew anything so they were not criminals, but Saturn tells Dr. Vegapunk that it is his fault for getting them dragged into his thirst for knowledge.

The Pacifista are ordered to remain on the island as the Marines board their ships. Sanji tells Franky and Atlas to get to the Vacuum Rocket and reunite with everyone at the Labophase. Bonney asks Sanji about Dr. Vegapunk and Sanji reassures her he will go back for them. Once they take off, Sanji contacts Nami asking about her status, with her telling him they made it to the back entrance and asks what happened on his end. He tells her what has been going on and she, Chopper, and Usopp react with fear that a Buster Call is incoming. Nami asks Sanji if Luffy is with him, but he says he lost sight of him. Nami also tells him that Zoro is still fighting Lucci and Jinbe was sent to get him. Nami also tells Sanji that Lilith did not fall down with the others and Brook had gone to help her move the Thousand Sunny. However, she follows up by revealing that the Vegaforce-01 was completely destroyed, so their previous plan is no longer viable.

With the ship, Lilith praises Brook for coming up with an idea for getting the ship to the back entrance, which involved the latter freezing the clouds with his powers for the ship to slide on. However, when Lilith asks how they plan on stopping when they get there, he says he did not think of that, much to her annoyance, and the two start panicking. Meanwhile, the Buster Call finally begins, and much of the Fabriophase is destroyed as Dr. Vegapunk helplessly watches.

To make matters worse, Kizaru destroys the Vacuum Rocket’s tube, causing everyone to fall out of the air. Sanji moves to rescue them, but Saturn orders the Pacifista to kill Kuma and Bonney both, calling it a fitting fate for the man who threw his life away for his daughter to live, even going so far as to call Kuma’s struggles the height of folly. Dr. Vegapunk watches in horror as his soldiers prepare to blast the two. Elsewhere, Luffy has eaten a ton of food produced from Dr. Vegapunk’s invention, but he has also been found by the Marines and cannot even move.

Unbeknownst to both Dr. Vegapunk and Saturn, the ship that was sent to kill the researchers was sunk before it could accomplish its mission. A surviving Marine tries to contact Kizaru to let them know that “they” are coming to Egghead.

Quick References[]

Chapter Notes[]

  • As the Marines prepare the Buster Call on Egghead, Saint Saturn and Kizaru decline to evacuate.
  • Vegapunk begs Saturn and Kizaru to call off the Buster Call, offering himself up instead.
    • Vegapunk tells them that if the research on Egghead is destroyed, it will set the world back 100 years.
  • To Vegapunk's horror, Saturn says that he ordered for the evacuation ship that left Egghead earlier to be sunk.
    • Saturn claims Vegapunk is solely responsible for this, as he studied forbidden topics like the scholars at Ohara did.
    • Unbeknownst to them, the Marines had failed to sink it.
  • As Sanji helps Atlas, Bonney, Franky, and Kuma escape to the Vacuum rocket, he leaves them to recover Vegapunk.
    • Sanji contacts Nami via Den Den Mushi, and she confirms that Zoro is still occupied fighting Lucci, so Jinbe went to help him.
    • Robin is seen injured and being treated by Chopper.
  • Lilith and Brook manage to move the Thousand Sunny thanks to the latter freezing the clouds for the ship to slide on.
  • As the Buster Call begins, Kizaru intercepts the Vacuum rocket carrying Atlas, Bonney, Franky, and Kuma and makes it crash.
    • As Sanji tries to save them, Saturn orders the Pacifista units to open fire on them.
  • As Luffy is bloated from over eating, he is found by several Marines who attempt to capture him.
  • The Marine ships that were sent to destroy the evacuation ship were themselves destroyed by an unknown party.
    • The surviving Marines try to contact Kizaru to warn him about the new arrivals.

Author Comment[]


Author Comment
  • Translation
  • Original


I went to the Jump New Year’s party. Everyone was so full of energy that it reinvigorated me!! Let’s all keep grinding!


ジャンプの新年会に行って来た。皆様力に溢れてて元気買いました!!頑張ろう

—Eiichiro Oda
English translation by VIZ Media. For comprehensive translation credits, see here.

'''Chapter 1105''' is titled "The Height Of Folly". 

==Cover Page==
[[Cover Page]] Request: "[[Carrot]] cooking a stew (and preferably taste-testing it!)" by PN Odamania's Brother.

==Short Summary==
As the [[Marines]] prepare the [[Buster Call]], [[Vegapunk]] attempts to give himself to no avail as [[Jaygarcia Saturn|Saturn]] does not believe the world needs progress. [[Sanji]] sends the rest of the group to Labophase while he will retrieve Vegapunk as he contacts [[Nami]] to warn the others about the Buster Call. Nami reports the situation from their end, including that [[Vegapunk/Lilith|Lilith]] and [[Brook]] have moved the [[Thousand Sunny]]. As the Marines begin their bombardment, [[Borsalino|Kizaru]] destroys the Vacuum Rocket that [[Franky]]'s group is on. 

As Saturn orders the [[Pacifista]]s to kill [[Bartholomew Kuma|Kuma]] and [[Jewelry Bonney|Bonney]], [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] is discovered to be using the Food Machine to replenish himself. Meanwhile the Marine ship sent to kill the researchers that escaped [[Egghead]] is damaged and the surviving Marines onboard want to warn Kizaru that they failed in their mission and that an [[Giant Warrior Pirates|unknown party]] is heading to Egghead.

==Long Summary==
All [[Marines]] are ordered to return to the ships before the [[Buster Call]] can begin. [[Doll]] tells [[Jaygarcia Saturn|Saturn]] and [[Borsalino|Kizaru]] to return to the ships with them, but Saturn says the two of them will remain on the island and to begin the bombardment as soon as possible. Doll is hesitant, but Kizaru sternly orders her to leave, and she does. [[Vegapunk|Dr. Vegapunk]] demands to know why Saturn wants all of [[Egghead|Egghead Island]] destroyed if he just came for his life, claiming that if the island is destroyed, it will set mankind back by an entire century. He pleads with the two of them to call off the attack, but Saturn refuses, claiming Dr. Vegapunk might be hiding more things from the [[World Government]] on the island, but he also says that mankind has no need for further advancement.

Saturn then tells Dr. Vegapunk that he ordered the ship with all of the researchers hunted down and destroyed, to the scientist’s shock. Saturn tries to justify his decision by saying the researchers may have known something about the [[Void Century]], so he wanted them all dead to ensure they do not tell anyone. Dr. Vegapunk yells that none of them knew anything so they were not criminals, but Saturn tells Dr. Vegapunk that it is his fault for getting them dragged into his thirst for knowledge.

The [[Pacifista]] are ordered to remain on the island as the Marines board their ships. [[Sanji]] tells [[Franky]] and [[Vegapunk/Atlas|Atlas]] to get to the Vacuum Rocket and reunite with everyone at the Labophase. [[Jewelry Bonney|Bonney]] asks Sanji about Dr. Vegapunk and Sanji reassures her he will go back for them. Once they take off, Sanji contacts [[Nami]] asking about her status, with her telling him they made it to the back entrance and asks what happened on his end. He tells her what has been going on and she, [[Tony Tony Chopper|Chopper]], and [[Usopp]] react with fear that a Buster Call is incoming. Nami asks Sanji if [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] is with him, but he says he lost sight of him. Nami also tells him that [[Roronoa Zoro|Zoro]] is still fighting [[Rob Lucci|Lucci]] and [[Jinbe]] was sent to get him. Nami also tells Sanji that [[Vegapunk/Lilith|Lilith]] did not fall down with the others and [[Brook]] had gone to help her move the [[Thousand Sunny]]. However, she follows up by revealing that the [[Vegaforce-01]] was completely destroyed, so their previous plan is no longer viable.

With the ship, Lilith praises Brook for coming up with an idea for getting the ship to the back entrance, which involved the latter freezing the clouds with his [[Yomi Yomi no Mi|powers]] for the ship to slide on. However, when Lilith asks how they plan on stopping when they get there, he says he did not think of that, much to her annoyance, and the two start panicking. Meanwhile, the Buster Call finally begins, and much of the Fabriophase is destroyed as Dr. Vegapunk helplessly watches.

To make matters worse, Kizaru destroys the Vacuum Rocket’s tube, causing everyone to fall out of the air. Sanji moves to rescue them, but Saturn orders the Pacifista to kill [[Bartholomew Kuma|Kuma]] and Bonney both, calling it a fitting fate for the man who threw his life away for his daughter to live, even going so far as to call Kuma’s struggles the height of folly. Dr. Vegapunk watches in horror as his soldiers prepare to blast the two. Elsewhere, Luffy has eaten a ton of food produced from Dr. Vegapunk’s invention, but he has also been found by the Marines and cannot even move.

Unbeknownst to both Dr. Vegapunk and Saturn, the ship that was sent to kill the researchers was sunk before it could accomplish its mission. A surviving Marine tries to contact Kizaru to let them know that “[[Giant Warrior Pirates|they]]” are coming to Egghead.

==Quick References==
===Chapter Notes===
*As the [[Marines]] prepare the [[Buster Call]] on [[Egghead]], [[Jaygarcia Saturn|Saint Saturn]] and [[Borsalino|Kizaru]] decline to evacuate.
*[[Vegapunk]] begs Saturn and Kizaru to call off the Buster Call, offering himself up instead.
**Vegapunk tells them that if the research on Egghead is destroyed, it will set the world back 100 years.

**Unbeknownst to them, the Marines had failed to sink it.

*As the Buster Call begins, Kizaru intercepts the Vacuum rocket carrying Atlas, Bonney, Franky, and Kuma and makes it crash.
**As Sanji tries to save them, Saturn orders the [[Pacifista]] units to open fire on them.
*As [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] is bloated from over eating, he is found by several Marines who attempt to capture him.
*The Marine ships that were sent to destroy the evacuation ship were themselves destroyed by an [[Giant Warrior Pirates|unknown party]].
**The surviving Marines try to contact Kizaru to warn him about the new arrivals.
